text: Magia (English: Magic) is the debut studio album by Colombian singer Maluma. It was released on 7 August 2012, by Sony Music Colombia. The album was supported by six singles: "Farandulera", "Loco", "Obsesión", "Magia", "Pasarla Bien" and "Miss Independent". ==Track listing== ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2012 debut albums Category:Maluma (singer) albums Category:Sony Music Colombia albums Category:Spanish-language albums
title: Magia (Maluma album)
